Ok, we're almost ready to elect the new council, just gotta get one 
more person all set to go. But now we gotta decide how we're gonna 
elect three people. Do you guys want to just take the people with the 
three highest votes or make a new poll each time electing one person 
at a time, or something else? I'm open to ideas.
